abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of: (a)
            improving supplies of fuelwood, building poles, tree fodder,
            and other minor forest products for the rural and urban
            population with special emphasis on a considerably expanded
            rural participation in afforestation; and (b) a continuation
            of the education and training process started under the
            first project, through reinforcing the Forestry Department,
            helping the Government develop a better forestry policy and
            testing different approaches to forestry development in
            Niger in particular and the Sahel in general.
